#summary A rough XML template for a file containing data to construct a level.

= XML Level File Template =

This probably won't be final yet, but it's just a rough template for a level file. If I forgot anything let me know. Also, the number values I've put in are arbitrary right now, as I wasn't sure at this point what the numbers would actually be.

{{{
<?xml version = "1.0"?>

<!-- Luminance Game Level Template -->
<!-- Designed by Steven Indzeoski -->
<!-- University of Saskatchewan CMPT 371 -->

<level>
	<!-- Level Information -->
	<name>Level 1</name>
	<difficulty>easy</difficulty>
	<grid_size>
		<x>20</x>
		<y>20</y>
	</grid_size>
	
	<!-- Level Objects -->
	<object>
		<type>brick</type>
		<position>
			<x>20</x>
			<y>20</y>
		</position>
		<rotation>120</rotation>
	</object>
	<object>
		<type>goal</type>
		<colour>red</colour>
		<position>
			<x>50</x>
			<y>15</y>
		</position>
		<rotation>180</rotation>
	</object>
	
	<!-- Level Tools -->
	<tool>
		<type>mirror</type>
		<count>5</count>
	</tool>
	<tool>
		<type>prism</type>
		<count>1</count>
	</tool>
</level>
}}}
